thread.title: LSU lands commitment from No. 1 2026 WR Tristen Keys
thread.title_full: LSU lands commitment from No. 1 2026 WR Tristen Keys

author: Andrew Olson
title: LSU lands commitment from No. 1 2026 WR Tristen Keys
text:
LSU lands commitment from No. 1 2026 WR Tristen Keys
Tristen Keys is looking to continue the WRU tradition at LSU. Keys, ranked the top wide receiver in the 2026 recruiting class, verbally committed to play for Brian Kelly at LSU on Wednesday. Hayes Fawcett of On3 helped break the news, and Keys confirmed it with his own social media post. Crib Talk https://t.co/Rcjhi8Mnes â€” Tristen(TK5)Keys 5 (@Tkgot5) March 19, 2025 RELATED: Sports betting is live in Louisiana!
